name: VR basketball shooting practice
description:
This is a casual and entertaining simulated shooting game. Players can restore the shooting scene in the most realistic way when wearing a helmet. Whether it is a series of operations such as three-pointers, two-pointers, free throws, jump shots or slam dunks, players are all It can be reproduced in the game, and there are teammates on the field to practice passing. Improve your shooting skills and shooting percentage through game training.

Instructions:
Left handle
Up, down, left, and right ------ move
Menu key------menu
Trigger------jump

Right handle
Left and right ------ rotate
Trigger pressed ------ catch a basketball
Trigger release------Let go of the basketball
Menu key------menu
